sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import axios from "axios"; import { useSnackbar } from "react-simple-snackbar"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Register = () => { const [message, setMessage] = useState(); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { register, handleSubmit, watch, formState: { errors }, } = useForm(); const options = { position: "bottom-right", style: { backgroundColor: "gray", border: "2px solid lightgreen", color: "white", fontFamily: "Menlo, monospace", fontSize: "20px", textAlign: "center", }, closeStyle: { color: "lightcoral", fontSize: "16px", }, }; const [openSnackbar] = useSnackbar(options); const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL}/api/register/`) console.log("DATA", data); setLoading(true); const body = { ...data, phone: parseInt(data.phone), }; axios .post(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL}/api/register`, { ...body }) .then(function (response) { // handle success console.log("hello") console.log("THIS", response) setLoading(false); setMessage(response?.data?.message); openSnackbar(response?.data?.message); localStorage.setItem("user", JSON.stringify(response?.data?.user)); //console.log(response?.data?.user); navigate("/login"); }) .catch(function (error) { // handle error setLoading(false); setMessage(error?.response?.data?.message); openSnackbar(error?.response?.data?.message); //console.log(error?.response?.data?.message); }) .then(function () { // always executed }); //console.log(data); }; return (

Sign up

{message && (
{message}
)}
First Name
{errors.first_name && errors.first_name.type === "required" && ( First Name is required )}
Last Name:
{errors.last_name && errors.last_name.type === "required" && ( Last Name is required )}
Email:
{errors.email && errors.email.type === "required" && ( Email is required )}
Password:
{errors.password && errors.password.type === "required" && ( Password is required )}
Phone No:
{errors.phone && errors.phone.type === "required" && ( Phone No is required )}
Already have an account? Login
{/*
Loading...
*/}
); }; export default Register;
